version.author: hsuanice
version.changelog: v0.2.0 - Switch to XR-style stack: ReaImGui version lock (0.9.3.2), dark theme table, 16pt font, docking config - Keep HUD behavior: auto-resize, right-click to close v0.1.0 - Initial minimal HUD (no custom font/theme)

version.author: hsuanice
version.changelog: v0.2.2 - Implement mode B: show a warning dialog once if the theme library is missing, but do not abort. v0.2.1 - Use shared color library: hsuanice_ReaImGui Theme Color.lua (apply/pop per frame) - Remove local theme table and push_theme(); add safe fallback if library missing v0.2.0 - XR-style stack: ReaImGui lock (0.9.3.2), dark theme table, 16pt font, docking config v0.1.0 - Initial minimal HUD (no custom font/theme)

reapack.name: hsuanice_Track and Razor Item Link like Pro Tools.lua
reapack.desc: Track and Razor Item Link like Pro Tools (performance edition)

version.author: hsuanice
version.changelog: - NEW: One-side trigger guard â€” prevents "ping-pong" (itemsâ†’tracksâ†’items) within the same cycle. - Stable across all test cases (Razor, Virtual, Time Selection, Select-All 40182). - Confirmed performance-friendly under large sessions (200+ tracks, thousands of items). v0.8.5-perf-bugfix4 - Internal testing build (single-side trigger, pre-official). v0.8.5-perf-bugfix3 - Gate: skip C/D if tracks changed due to items this tick (e.g. Select-All). v0.8.4-perf-bugfix2 - Step B: absolute set for track selection to avoid edge cases after 40182. v0.8.3-perf-bugfix - Fix "need to click twice" with Razor; canonical Razor signature. v0.8.2-perf - Suppress relatch shrink after script-driven item changes. v0.8.1-perf-hotfix - Restore set_track_level_ranges(). v0.8.0-perf - Major perf pass.

version.author: hsuanice
version.changelog: v0.9.0 - NEW: Read & display shared link state from Project ExtState "hsuanice_Link". v0.8.1 - Metadata: add Note and Reference sections. v0.8 - Fix undefined compute_item_sel_range(); add Cancel UI; add preference monitoring.

version.author: hsuanice
version.changelog: v0.9.1 - Show latched virtual range (virt_latched_start/end). Refresh signature includes these. v0.9.0 - Added Shared Link State section from Project ExtState "hsuanice_Link".

reapack.name: hsuanice_Hover.lua
reapack.desc: hsuanice Hover Library (Shared helpers for Hover Mode editing tools)

version.author: hsuanice
version.changelog: v0.1.0 - Initial skeleton: â€¢ Unified function naming (is_/build_/resolve_/apply_ separation). â€¢ Provides hover state, ruler detection, mouse timeline pos, snap-in-hover, half-pixel epsilon, item visibility. â€¢ Target builders for Split and Trim/Extend.

version.author: hsuanice
version.changelog:
v0.2.0 HIGH ROI â€¢ selection_sync_enabled(is_true_hover, min) â†’ bool, sel_count â€¢ filter_leftmost_selected_per_track(picks) â†’ picks (left only) â€¢ filter_rightmost_selected_per_track(picks) â†’ picks (right only) â€¢ pick_on_gap(side, pos) â†’ { {item=â€¦, mode="extend"} } from mouse track â€¢ clamp_left_extend_no_overlap(item, new_st, eps) â†’ clamped start â€¢ clamp_right_extend_no_overlap(item, new_en, eps) â†’ clamped end â€¢ apply_left_edge_no_flicker(item, target_pos) (preserve fade-in END, audio offset, no flicker) â€¢ apply_right_edge_no_flicker(item, target_pos) (preserve fade-out START, no flicker) â€¢ collect_edit_mode_picks(side, pos) â†’ picks for non-hover (Edit Cursor + selected tracks)
MID ROI â€¢ ts_overlap_stats(ts_start, ts_end, items_opt) â†’ {overlaps, boundary_hits, edges_only, list} â€¢ run_split_by_time_selection(overlapped_items) â†’ do 40061 + reselect overlapped â€¢ log / logf with library-level toggle: set_debug(true/false) â€¢ eps() alias to half_pixel_sec()
LOW ROI â€¢ save_item_selection() / restore_item_selection(list) â€¢ build_selected_items_split_info(pos, eps) & select_right_halves_after_split(split_info, pos, eps) â€¢ add_hover_item_outside_selection_crossing(targets, pos, eps) (for split â€œhover alsoâ€)

reapack.name: hsuanice_List Table.lua
